SELECT shore_exp_id as LOG_COM_ID,exp_name as NAME FROM np_third_shore_express WHERE shore_exp_id = #{logComId, jdbcType=BIGINT }
mapper.update:

mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(LOG_COM_ID) FROM NP_SYS_LOGISTICS_COMPANY D WHERE
D.LOG_COM_ID = #{logComId, jdbcType=BIGINT } AND
D.NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') AND
D.CODE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') AND
D.COM_URL like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{comUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') AND
D.QUERY_URL like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{queryUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') AND
D.SORT = #{sort, jdbcType=BIGINT } AND
D.USED_STATUS like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{usedStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') AND
D.INSERT_ID = #{insertId, jdbcType=BIGINT } AND
(D.INSERT_DATE between #{insertDateStart,jdbcType=DATE} AND #{insertDateEnd,jdbcType=DATE}) and
D.MODIFY_ID = #{modifyId, jdbcType=BIGINT } AND
(D.MODIFY_DATE between #{modifyDateStart,jdbcType=DATE} AND #{modifyDateEnd,jdbcType=DATE}) and
D.DELETE_STATUS = #{deleteStatus, jdbcType=BIGINT } AND
1=1

SELECT FROM NP_SYS_LOGISTICS_COMPANY D WHERE
D.LOG_COM_ID = #{logComId, jdbcType=BIGINT } AND
D.NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') AND
D.CODE like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') AND
D.COM_URL like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{comUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') AND
D.QUERY_URL like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{queryUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') AND
D.SORT = #{sort, jdbcType=BIGINT } AND
D.USED_STATUS like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{usedStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') AND
D.INSERT_ID = #{insertId, jdbcType=BIGINT } AND
(D.INSERT_DATE between #{insertDateStart,jdbcType=DATE} AND #{insertDateEnd,jdbcType=DATE}) and
D.MODIFY_ID = #{modifyId, jdbcType=BIGINT } AND
(D.MODIFY_DATE between #{modifyDateStart,jdbcType=DATE} AND #{modifyDateEnd,jdbcType=DATE}) and
D.DELETE_STATUS = #{deleteStatus, jdbcType=BIGINT } AND
1=1 ORDER BY D.sort LIMIT #{startRowNum,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{endRowNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}
SELECT FROM NP_SYS_LOGISTICS_COMPANY WHERE USED_STATUS = '1' AND DELETE_STATUS = '0'
